summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund, for the purpose of defraying the additional cost to be incurred by constructing a bridge roadway on Ewing Street, from Evanston Avenue on Aurora Avenue; and for constructing an elevate sidewalk on the east side of Fremont Avenue, from Ewing Street to Blewett Street, in connection with the improvement of Westlake Avenue North et al., by Grading, etc., as authorized by Ordinance No. 23458, creating Local Improvement District No. 2284.
